00036 #include "FibreConverter.hpp"
00037 #include "FibreReader.hpp"
00038 #include "FibreWriter.hpp"
00039 
00040 void FibreConverter::Convert(const FileFinder& rSourceFile, const std::string& rOutputFolderName)
00041 {
00042     const std::string leaf_name = rSourceFile.GetLeafNameNoExtension();
00043     FileFinder ortho_finder(leaf_name + ".ortho", rSourceFile.GetParent());
00044     if (ortho_finder.Exists())
00045     {
00046         FibreReader<3> ortho_reader(ortho_finder, ORTHO);
00047         std::vector< c_vector<double, 3> > fibres;
00048         std::vector< c_vector<double, 3> > second;
00049         std::vector< c_vector<double, 3> > third;
00050         ortho_reader.GetAllOrtho(fibres, second, third);
00051         //Write binary file
00052         FibreWriter<3> fibre_writer(rOutputFolderName, leaf_name+"_bin", false);
00053         fibre_writer.SetWriteFileAsBinary();
00054         fibre_writer.WriteAllOrtho(fibres, second, third);
00055     }
00056 
00057     FileFinder axi_finder(leaf_name + ".axi", rSourceFile.GetParent());
00058     if (axi_finder.Exists())
00059     {
00060         FibreReader<3> axi_reader(axi_finder, AXISYM);
00061         std::vector< c_vector<double, 3> > fibres;
00062         axi_reader.GetAllAxi(fibres);
00063         //Write binary file
00064         FibreWriter<3> fibre_writer(rOutputFolderName, leaf_name + "_bin", false);
00065         fibre_writer.SetWriteFileAsBinary();
00066         fibre_writer.WriteAllAxi(fibres);
00067     }
00068 }
